name: Experimental Movement: Flight
description:
This is a tech demo to showcase my movement script, it is only made to work, so don't expect any good graphics from this. The main focus of the project is the flight movement, and swapping between running and flying, things like jumping and crouching seemed like a waste of time to implement, so I haven't.

Controls

Move - WASD

Switch movement (Fly / Stop flying) - Space

Sprint / Fly faster - Left Shift

Unlock Mouse - Tab (Hold)

Main menu - Esc

Animations created with Mixamo.

Ground material free asset.

If you want, you can join the Dragon's Lair, and possibly get early updates on what I'm doing, or you can share your own work, gamedev or not, as long as it's SFW: https://discord.gg/hGbkQNjjgz
